message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our premium product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can come to an even better agreement. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $14000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $13500. This is a fair price considering the product's value and quality.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $13000 for the product.

I understand your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13250. This is as low as I can go, considering the product's value and my costs.
